Hierarch Kekropus:
Many of the Giants began to clamor for more active opposition to the gods. They began to experiment with life itself, ultimately creating a new, innocent, living being free from the restraints imposed on other mortals by the gods. That is how the Kamael came into this world, including myself. But finally the gods noticed the Kamael. Einhasad saw our presence as an act of rebellion and was furious. War brok out between the gods and the Giants -- although technically, it was actually a war between Einhasad and the Giants. The other gods did not participate in the war, but I do not know why. Continue listening.
